Bash(".venv\Scripts\python.exe" -c "
import pandas as pd
import os

# Get all unique actions across all videos
all_actions = set()
train_dir = ''data/processed/train''
annotation_files = [f for f in os.listdir(train_dir) if f.endswith(''_annotations.parquet'')]

for f in annotation_files[:50]:  # Sample first 50
    df = pd.read_parquet(os.path.join(train_dir, f))
    all_actions.update(df[''action''].unique())

print(''All unique actions:'', sorted(all_actions))
print(''Number of unique actions:'', len(all_actions))
")

Bash(".venv\Scripts\python.exe" -c "
# Test data loading
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, ''.'')
from tcn_behavior_model import *

print(''Testing data loading...'')

config = Config()
processor = DataProcessor(config.DATA_DIR, config)

# Test loading a single video
video_id = ''44566106''
features, annotations, metadata = processor.load_video_data(video_id)

print(f''Features shape: {features.shape}'')
print(f''Annotations shape: {annotations.shape}'')
print(f''Metadata keys: {list(metadata.keys())[:5]}...'')
print(f''Unique actions in this video: {annotations[""action""].unique().tolist()}'')
")
